homepage.title: MindFull
homepage.subtitle: A Gamified Experience to Mental Wellness...
homepage.description: Your one stop solution for Mental Fitness

gamified.title: Gamified Experience
gamified.description: Earn points, badges, and track your progress through engaging mental health activities

community.title: Supportive Community
community.description: Connect with peers and share your journey in a safe, supportive environment

professional.title: Professional Support
professional.description: Access licensed counselors and mental health professionals when you need them

personalized.title: Personalized Content
personalized.description: AI-driven recommendations tailored to your specific mental health needs

testimonial1.content: MindfullStudent has completely changed how I handle stress. The AI-driven exercises help me stay on track, and the peer support community makes me feel less alone. I've become more confident and focused!
testimonial1.author: ALEX J

testimonial2.content: I used to struggle with anxiety before exams, but MindfullStudent's mindfulness techniques and expert guidance have helped me stay calm. Now, I feel more balanced and in control
testimonial2.author: PRIYA S

testimonial3.content: MindfullStudent provided me with the tools to manage my mental health effectively. The personalized approach made a huge difference in my daily routine. Highly recommended!
testimonial3.author: ROBERT M

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Any Queries or Feedback? We are Happy to help you out there!

comingSoon.description: New games and exercises are on their way to keep your mind sharp and engaged.

kumbhaka.title: Kumbhaka
kumbhaka.description: A great exercise to help in improving lung capacity, oxygen intake, and can promote relaxation and mental clarity.

boxBreathing.title: Box breathing
boxBreathing.description: A simple yet effective way to calm the nervous system, manage stress, and improve focus by activating the parasympathetic nervous system.

mahamrityunjaya.title: Mahamrityunjaya Breathing
mahamrityunjaya.description: Inhaling and exhaling through one nostril for each part of the mantra as part of a Nadi Shodhana Pranayama practice

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: Stay tuned! A fun cardio exercise that will get your heart pumping and your body moving.
